backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with color variables and global theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component centering the ValentinePrompt UI on the page.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationPhoto: Image component with load/error handling, state reset on src change, and fadeâ€‘in behavior.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenCelebr: Empty file placeholder for the fullscreen celebration viewer component.
frontend/src/components/InlineCelebratio: Inline celebration view rendering floating hearts, two photos via getAssetUrl, and themed celebration text.
Interactive prompt with evasive No button logic and conditional rendering of the inline celebration state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating or retrieving a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, base typography, and custom romantic-themed utility classes with animations and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Provides a helper to build base-path-aware asset URLs for Vite deployments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and plugins for a romantic-themed UI palette.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine webpage implementation.
